title: Want to know what font is this
content:
This font is kinda Centaur Pro Bold Italic, I'm searching everywhere to find this font and i didn't find...

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20131013015924im_/http:/typophile.com/files/Untitled-1_3615.jpg)
author: Candorebanto

comments.content:
Hello  
Please check:  
 [http://www.whatfontis.com/Sakkal-Majalla-Bold.font?text=wellnesscenter](http://web.archive.org/web/20131013015924/http:/www.whatfontis.com/Sakkal-Majalla-Bold.font?text=wellnesscenter "http://www.whatfontis.com/Sakkal-Majalla-Bold.font?text=wellnesscenter")  
Alex  
I found it using: [http://www.whatfontis.com](http://web.archive.org/web/20131013015924/http:/www.whatfontis.com/ "http://www.whatfontis.com") - Identify the font you are looking for!
woahhh thank you very much sir

A system font on Windows 7! Never occurred to me to check there.  
Don
